content.raw:
This introduced a few cppcheck errors on xenial:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopTests/job/ignition_math-ci-default-xenial-amd64/21/cppcheckResult/
content.html:
This introduced a few cppcheck errors on xenial:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopTests/job/ignition_math-ci-default-xenial-amd64/21/cppcheckResult/

update.description:
Remove exceptions from ign-math. This will make it easier to write a C (and scripting language) wrappers for this library.

We were also using exceptions as a way to communicate errors, which is not ideal. This pull request clamps a few index values where appropriate, and produces error values in other cases.
update.title: Remove exceptions

content.raw: I didn't change it because it's not const in the implementation. Making it const would require a copy that doesn't seem necessary.
content.html: I didn't change it because it's not const in the implementation. Making it const would require a copy that doesn't seem necessary.

content.raw: Exactly, We use the `u` suffix because we need an unsigned int.
content.html: Exactly, We use the u suffix because we need an unsigned int.

content.raw: No. A const pass by value does not cause any migration issues.
content.html: No. A const pass by value does not cause any migration issues.

content.raw: The AppVeyor job is failing, is this expected?
content.html: The AppVeyor job is failing, is this expected?

content.raw: Why not change the double param to be const too? (I realize this will require a change in the implementation)
content.html: Why not change the double param to be const too? (I realize this will require a change in the implementation)

content.raw: Does the change to const here need to be documented in migration?
content.html: Does the change to const here need to be documented in migration?
